transcript: I know you are Augie really I do. I know you wanted this to be special and nice and it's the full moon and the sand and all but I just couldn't help thinking about being somewhere else

segments.text: I know you are Augie really I do. I know you wanted this to be special and nice and it's the full moon and the sand and all but
I just couldn't help thinking about being somewhere else

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: I know you are, Augie.  Really I do.  I know you wanted this to be special and nice and it's the full moon and the sand and all but I just couldn't help thinking about being somewhere else.
